strapiEvent.name: Peacock Alley luxury bedding event
strapiEvent.description: Hosting a special event featuring Peacock Alley, a luxury bedding line. Representatives from Dallas will be at the 2-day event showing the latest fall introductions. The star of the event will be "Steel Magnolia," a 35-ft. Airstream retrofitted as a traveling display. The public is invited to tour "Steel Magnolia" and enjoy giveaways, discounts and refreshments. 1-5 pm Sept 20 and 10-5 Sept 21.
